entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 02 January 2023
